qas.question: When did kings grant privileges to the nobles?

answers.text: at the time of their election to the throne

qas.question: What was also in exchange during he election of the throne?

answers.text: ad hoc permission to raise an extraordinary tax

qas.question: What did nobles get in from the king during election?

context: Poland's successive kings granted <a3_0>privileges<a3_0/> to the nobility <a0_0>at the time of their election to the throne<a0_0/> (the privileges being specified in the <a1_0>king-elect's Pacta conventa<a1_0/>) and at other times in exchange for <a2_0>ad hoc permission to raise an extraordinary tax<a2_0/> or a pospolite ruszenie.
